The prebuilt EDK2 image is for booting Linux on QEMU virt armv8 platform.
We use EDK2 as the BL33 image of ARM trusted firmware which will be executed
by BL31 image in boot process.

[Source code]
https://github.com/tianocore/edk2.git

[How to build]
Please refer to https://github.com/OP-TEE/build/blob/master/qemu_v8.mk
